name: Bitmagnet
short_description: Self-hosted BitTorrent indexer, DHT crawler, and torrent search engine.
description: Bitmagnet is a self-hosted BitTorrent indexer, DHT crawler, content classifier, and torrent search engine with a web UI. It crawls the DHT network to discover and index torrents, enabling powerful search and Servarr integration without relying on external trackers.
usecases: Index and search torrents across the DHT network without relying on public torrent sites.
Integrate with Servarr apps (Radarr, Sonarr) as a custom indexer for automated media acquisition.
